column5: Just wanted to say Congrats to Beans and my mom for surviving 30 years together....on Nov. 14th  Hope you had a great day!!!!  Maureen
That woman should be nominated for sainthood to have put up with him for all those years  Seriously though all the very best to both of you!
Happy Anniversary to a pair of real nice people.  All the best !!
Very nice. Lew,any womAn that would put up with us that long should be.LOL   Congrats you two.
Hope you both had a wonderful day. Hugs to you Maribeth...ok, ok, one for you too, Norm.
Hope you guys have a great day and get what you both want Beans to get out fishing and mom to have a nice quiet day
Happy Anniversary Guys Aint love grand
Congrats to Norm and Maribeth, a true love story
Gotta agree with Cliff  Congrats on 30 years you 2 love birds
Happy belated and congrats to the both of you
That's just fantastic! Congrats to you both.
Hmmmmmmmmmmmmm, maybe that blue pill is working overtime?  Oh me bad.

Thanks all...actually we had a quiet day...never got out of our bathrobes...we were on the run since last Thursday and needed a day of rest...besides, the restaurant we wanted to go to is closed on Mondays and Tuesdays so we will hit it tomorrow evening (most of the good ones are closed for the season)...  We had our great-grandson here for the weekend to take in the Christmas festivities at Settler's Village...  As some know we have had Chiquita here for over a year now and we were a bit leary as to whether she would take to having a kid around...but as you can see, her and Ryan James got along famously...
Been meaning to send my congrats Norm, just keep getting side tracked.  But I had a moment and remembered (rare as that is) that I was tardy, so belated congratulations to you and the Mrs.
